spec_data.Name: perl-File-Temp
spec_data.Description:
File::Temp can be used to create and open temporary files in a safe way.
There is both a function interface and an object-oriented interface. The
File::Temp constructor or the tempfile() function can be used to return the
name and the open file handle of a temporary file. The tempdir() function
can be used to create a temporary directory.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 11:41:55 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Return name and handle of a temporary file safely
